```{r}
Bitcoin=21000000   # 21 Million Bitcoin (Most Bitcoin that will be in Circulation)
Value=USD/Bitcoin  # Value of Bitcoin compared to current dollar
cat("Value=",Value)
```

```{r}
r = read.csv("C:/Users/Michael/Desktop/bitcoin/Bitcoin.csv", header=T, dec=",")
```

```{r}
head(r)
```

```{r}
r = as.data.frame(r)
rr = data.matrix(r[2:5])
head(rr)
```


```{r}
y = as.numeric(as.character(r$mkt_Price), na.action(r$mkt_Price))
describe(y)
```

```{r}
summary(y)
```

```{r}
sd_y <- sd(y)
mean_y <- mean(y)
y1 <- (y-mean_y)/sd_y
```


```{r}
qqPlot(y)
```

```{r}
quantile(y1,probs = seq(0.05,0.95,0.05))
```


```{r}
qqPlot(y1)
```

```{r}
hist(y1)
```

```{r}
breaks <- seq(from=min(y),
              to=max(y), length=11)
pop_freq <- cut(y, breaks=breaks,
                right=TRUE, include.lowest = TRUE)
table(pop_freq)
```

```{r}
summary(y)
```

```{r}
plot(r$Week, y,
     main = "Bitcoin Market Price",
     xlab = "Date",
     ylab = "Price")
lines(y, col = 'blue')
```


```{r}
hist(y, breaks=breaks, col = 'red')
```

```{r}
hist(y, freq=FALSE)
lines(density(y), lwd=3, col="blue")
```

```{r}
boxplot(y, ylab="Price")
```

## Data Exploration
```{r}
rr <- cor(rr)
corrplot(rr, method = "shade")
```
```{r}
r.lm1 <- lm(y ~ g_Trends + transactions + sp, data = r)
summary(r.lm1)
```

```{r}

summary(r.lm2)
```
